title: Hydrothermal liquefaction for biochar production from finger millet waste: its valorisation, process optimization, and characterization
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24492-24502
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03945A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Afzal Hussain, Ayush Kandari, Sushant Kotiyal, Vinod Kumar, Shuchi Upadhyay, Waseem Ahmad, Ajay Singh, Sanjay Kumar
In this study, the potential of finger millet waste biomass (FMWB) as a source of biochar production through hydrothermal liquefaction (HTL) was investigated.
